title: Air Density Calculation
description:
AIR_DENSITY calculates the density of air in kg / m³ depending on pressu￾re, humidity and temperature. The temperature is given in ° C, pressure in

Pascal and the humidity in % (50 = 50%).
name: AIR_DENSITY

output.name: Density of air
output.description: Calculated density of air in kg/m³.

return_value.description: The density of air in kg/m³ based on the provided inputs.
